text: Lek Yuen is one of the 36 constituencies in the Sha Tin District. The constituency returns one district councillor to the Sha Tin District Council, with an election every four years. The seat is currently held by Jimmy Sham of the League of Social Democrats. Lek Yuen constituency is loosely based on Lek Yuen Estate with an estimated population of 15,959. ==Councillors represented== {| class="wikitable" |- !colspan="2"|Election!!Member!!Party |- |style="background-color: " | | 1994 | rowspan=2| Tony Kan Chung-nin | Liberal |- |style="background-color: " | | 199? | Independent |- |style="background- color: " | | 2011 | rowspan=3| Michael Wong Yue-hon | Civil Force |- |style="background-color: " | | 2014 | NPP/CF |- |style="background-color: " | | 2018 | Civil Force |- |style="background-color: " | | 2019 | Jimmy Sham Tsz- kit | LSD |- |} ==Election results== ===2010s=== ===2000s=== ===1990s=== ==References== Category:Sha Tin Category:Constituencies of Hong Kong Category:Constituencies of Sha Tin District Council Category:1994 establishments in Hong Kong Category:Constituencies established in 1994
